functions.name: defender_servers_on_state
functions.description: Checks if Defender servers are on.

functions.name: defender_databases_set_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender is set on databases.

functions.name: defender_sql_servers_on_machines_status
functions.description: Checks Defender status on SQL servers on machines.

functions.name: defender_open_source_relational_databases_enabled
functions.description: Checks if Defender is enabled for open source relational databases.

functions.name: defender_dns_on_state
functions.description: Checks if Defender DNS is on.

functions.name: defender_resource_manager_is_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender Resource Manager is on.

functions.name: defender_recommendation_system_updates_completed
functions.description: Checks if Defender recommendation system updates are completed.

functions.name: defender_log_analytics_agent_vms_auto_provisioning_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender Log Analytics agent VMs auto provisioning is on.

functions.name: defender_auto_provisioning_vulnerability_assessment_machines_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender auto provisioning for vulnerability assessment machines is on.

functions.name: defender_containers_components_auto_provisioning_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender containers components auto provisioning is on.

functions.name: defender_security_contact_additional_email_configured
functions.description: Checks if Defender security contact additional email is configured.

functions.name: defender_cloud_apps_integration_status
functions.description: Checks Defender cloud apps integration status.

functions.name: defender_endpoint_integration_with_defender_cloud_selected
functions.description: Checks if Defender endpoint integration with Defender Cloud is selected.

functions.name: defender_servers_set_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender servers are set on.

functions.name: defender_sql_databases_managed_instance_on_state
functions.description: Checks Defender state on managed SQL database instances.

functions.name: defender_sql_server_machines_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender is on SQL server machines.

functions.name: defender_vulnerability_assessment_machines_auto_provisioning_on
functions.description: Checks if Defender vulnerability assessment machines auto provisioning is on.

functions.name: defender_cloud_apps_integration_selected
functions.description: Checks if Defender cloud apps integration is selected.

functions.name: defender_endpoint_integration_with_cloud_selected
functions.description: Checks if Defender endpoint integration with Cloud is selected.

functions.name: defender_coopted_systems_availability_prevention
functions.description: Checks Defender coopted systems availability prevention.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Defender API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
